subject: Freestyle Skiing
X Games
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Freestyle skiing in the halfpipe will make its Olympic debut in Sochi, Russia, in February, and David Wise is a gold-medal favorite, a two-planked version of the snowboarder Shaun White.
snippet: Freestyle skiing in the halfpipe will make its Olympic debut in Sochi, Russia, in February, and David Wise is a gold-medal favorite, a two-planked version of the snowboarder Shaun White.
